Our memorial came out perfect. It is exactly as we ordered and more beautiful in person. It looks exactly like a giant dog bone for our beloved Lab. He loved biscuits so this was absolutely perfect. We cut some flowers from our yard and placed them around the stone. Everyone got to say something about Buddy. On ordering I had a question and the shop owner called me on the phone. They offered their condolences for the loss of our beloved dog. The stone is thick, rounded on the ends, nothing sharp. The letters are carved into the biscuit and darkened so you can read them. It has a nice smooth finish. The biscuit was wrapped in multiple layers of bubble wrap, so it was well padded in a box with more stuffing to keep it from moving in the box. Again, I would like to say how happy I am with this item. Thank you Meltons!
